seo.title: Kuchnia Wybrzeża Amalfi
seo.description: Najważniejsze potrawy, składniki i polecane miejsca, w których warto ich spróbować.

sections.title: Markets & quick bites
body: Morning markets and deli counters sell focaccia, fried cuoppi, and fresh mozzarella for easy lunches.
Pick up citrus marmalade, colatura di alici, and dried herbs as flavour boosters for picnics.

sections.title: Desserts & pastries
body: Delizia al limone, babà al limoncello, and sfogliatella pair well with an espresso after dinner.

sections.title: Drinks & pairings
body: Order chilled limoncello or crema di limoncello as a digestivo after meals.
DOC wines from Tramonti or Costa d’Amalfi (Furore, Ravello) complement seafood and citrus-led dishes.

sections.title: Ordering etiquette
body: Share plates family-style but let staff know upfront so pacing and tableware stay smooth.

faqs.q: Do I need to reserve popular trattorias?

itemList.name: La Tagliata (Nocelle)
itemList.note: Fixed-course farmhouse dinner with handmade pasta, grilled meats, and sweeping terrace views.

itemList.name: Casa e Bottega
itemList.note: Daytime café for lemon-forward salads, cold-pressed juices, and house-made desserts.

items.alt: Seafood pasta with Amalfi Coast lemons
items.caption: Seafood staples from Positano trattorias

items.alt: Delizia al limone pastry on a plate
items.caption: Lemon desserts to sample

items.alt: Friends clinking limoncello glasses at sunset
items.caption: Digestivos with a view

sections.title: Sweets
body: Sample delizia al limone, babà al limoncello, and lemon sorbet for a citrus-led dessert trio.
Pair pastries with espresso or digestivo limoncello to close the meal like a local.
